JOB SUMMARY  This      role could be based in Singapore, Hong Kong and UAE. When you start the      application process you will be presented with a drop down menu showing      all countries, Please ensure that you select a country where the role is      based. A      senior-level product manager and leader who’s experienced in turning ideas      into seamless and intuitive product experiences. You are well-versed in      planning, designing, scaling, and commercialising products and know how to      test, validate, and optimize through the product life cycle. Products need      to be designed with a client focus and with strong business acumen to      prioritize and deliver against competing asks. You will influence and      inspire indirect teams to deliver positive outcomes with executional      excellence. If you are a creative problem solver, love tackling complex      challenges and building things from 0 to 1 and beyond, this role is for      you. The      role includes product management, governance, and product      commercialization activities to support the Digital Assets goals of the      business and build readiness for scale. The person will also be a “go-to”      contact for education, thought leadership, and Digital Assets related      product knowledge.  RESPONSIBILITIES Strategy  You      will support the commercialization and development of innovative blockchain      and digital asset solutions that have strategic fit and value to the      Bank’s clients  Business  You      will identify opportunities through client conversations, demand from      other business lines and your understanding of market trends to determine      what will be the most impactful products and features we should be      building. You will do so by instilling customer-centric discovery and      design methods, implementing strategic experimentation and garnering      stakeholder buy-in You      will be responsible for leading the product work for one or more of our      key strategic initiatives by driving strategy, tactics, and delivery      timelines. You will drive the end-to-end product development from      opportunity assessment, ideation, validation, and delivery to ongoing      optimization.  Processes  Use      modern productivity tools such as ADO, Teams, Slack, Trello, Mural, Jira, Confluence You      will influence the tech stack, data model, APIs, platform, and system      architecture, while determining when best to build, buy or borrow new      technologies and 3rd party integrations  People & Talent  You      will influence, inspire and collaborate closely with cross-functional      teams (e.g. technology, compliance, operations, marketing, legal, etc.)      and other business stakeholders to establish a shared vision for Digital      Assets products.  Risk Management  You      are resourceful and results oriented. You find a way to get things done      without sacrificing quality and integrity.  Governance  You      will ensure all governance requirements are understood and met during the      product development lifecycle, including but not limited to on-boarding      3rd parties, co-ordinating Consolidated Risk Assessments, managing      prioritization for tech teams and ensuring adequate testing is completed.  Regulatory & Business Conduct  Display      exemplary conduct and live by the Group’s Values and Code of Conduct. Take      personal responsibility for embedding the highest standards of ethics,      including regulatory and business conduct, across Standard Chartered Bank.      This includes understanding and ensuring compliance with, in letter and      spirit, all applicable laws, regulations, guidelines and the Group Code of      Conduct. Effectively      and collaboratively identify, escalate, mitigate and resolve risk, conduct      and compliance matters. Lead      to achieve the outcomes set out in the Bank’s Conduct Principles  Key Stakeholders  Businesses      across CIB – specifically TB Cash, FM FSS, Digital Assets CoE Compliance      – Product and CIB Platform and Partnerships, Financial Crime and      Surveillance Operations Legal      - Product and CIB Platform and Partnerships Technology      – Primarily DLT Technology Hive, but other product technology as well Vendor      and Third Party Partners  Our Ideal candidate  Strong      blockchain/web3 product management experience while being familiar in      related business areas such as custody, trading, payments 10 years      of experience working in financial services and/or enterprise fintech in a      product development role ideally dealing with emerging technologies. Track      record of building and bringing Digital Asset solutions to market that      deliver measurable impact for the customer and the business Capable      of dissecting and understanding complex problems, simplifying them into      clear hypotheses and developing executable solutions Understand      technology trends in Digital and provide insight & analysis to the      implications to Digital product and channel partner Highly      organized, analytical, data-obsessed and process driven Highly      effective communicator who can work with multi-jurisdictional,      cross-functional, geographically dispersed teams Certifications      - Relevant technology or crypto/blockchain certifications  Role Specific Technical Competencies  Strong      blockchain/web3 product management experience while being familiar in      related Experience      working in financial services and/or enterprise fintech in a product      development role ideally dealing with emerging technologies. ADO,      Teams, Slack, Trello, Mural, Jira, Confluence Process      Management Business      Writing & Communication Presentation      and PowerPoint skills  About Standard Chartered We're an international bank, nimble enough to act, big enough for impact. For more than 170 years, we've worked to make a positive difference for our clients, communities, and each other. We question the status quo, love a challenge and enjoy finding new opportunities to grow and do better than before. If you're looking for a career with purpose and you want to work for a bank making a difference, we want to hear from you. You can count on us to celebrate your unique talents and we can't wait to see the talents you can bring us. Our purpose, to drive commerce and prosperity through our unique diversity, together with our brand promise, to be here for good are achieved by how we each live our valued behaviours. When you work with us, you'll see how we value difference and advocate inclusion. Together we:  Do      the right thing and      are assertive, challenge one another, and live with integrity, while      putting the client at the heart of what we do Never      settle, continuously      striving to improve and innovate, keeping things simple and learning from      doing well, and not so well Are      better together, we      can be ourselves, be inclusive, see more good in others, and work      collectively to build for the long term  What we offer In line with our Fair Pay Charter, we offer a competitive salary and benefits to support your mental, physical, financial and social wellbeing.  Core      bank funding for retirement savings, medical and life insurance, with      flexible and voluntary benefits available in some locations. Time-off including      annual leave, parental/maternity (20 weeks), sabbatical (12 months      maximum) and volunteering leave (3 days), along with minimum global      standards for annual and public holiday, which is combined to 30 days      minimum. Flexible      working options      based around home and office locations, with flexible working patterns. Proactive      wellbeing support through Unmind, a market-leading digital      wellbeing platform, development courses for resilience and other human      skills, global Employee Assistance Programme, sick leave, mental      health first-aiders and all sorts of self-help toolkits A      continuous learning culture to support your growth, with      opportunities to reskill and upskill and access to physical, virtual and      digital learning. Being      part of an inclusive and values driven organisation, one that      embraces and celebrates our unique diversity, across our teams, business      functions and geographies - everyone feels respected and can realise their      full potential.
